House of Tweets Bird selection

All bird voices that can be selected, in the context of the project House of Tweets.

How it works

Each member of the parliament has been assigned a bird's voice. You can easily change that! A single click on one of the birds below, a Tweet sent, and our systems recognise your preferences!

Your Tweet only needs to contain the name of the bird and the hashtag #HouseOfTweets. Or #Hot, if that's too long for you.

List of recognised birds

Ara Tweet
Bald eagle Tweet
Barn swallow Tweet
Black redstart Tweet
Carrion crow Tweet
Coal tit Tweet
Common blackbird Tweet
Common chaffinch Tweet
Common chiffchaff Tweet
